_GEng_ImageLoad: Creates an image object from a file, or a rectangular part of a file
```GEng_Image.au3_GEng_ImageLoad($sPath, $imgW = Default, $imgH = Default, $x = Default, $y = Default, $w = Default, $h = Default)```
_GEng_ImageLoadStream: Creates an image object from a string representing binary image file data
```GEng_Image.au3_GEng_ImageLoadStream($pic, $imgW = Default, $imgH = Default, $x = Default, $y = Default, $w = Default, $h = Default)```
